statements: SELECT loyalty_id, customer_id, program_name, start_date, end_date, reward_points FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, program_name, start_date, reward_points, end_date, loyalty_id FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date, loyalty_id, reward_points, customer_id FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, reward_points, program_name, start_date, end_date, loyalty_id FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT program_name, SUM(reward_points) AS total_points FROM loyalty_program GROUP BY program_name HAVING SUM(reward_points) > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, program_name FROM loyalty_program WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date IS NULL;
SELECT loyalty_id, program_name, end_date FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5) ORDER BY loyalty_id;
SELECT MAX(reward_points) AS max_points, MIN(reward_points) AS min_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE end_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_points_required DESC;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points_required FROM rewards WHERE reward_points_required < 50;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, reward_name FROM customers JOIN rewards ON customers.loyalty_points >= rewards.reward_points_required;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_points_required < 500 ORDER BY reward_points_required DESC;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY loyalty_points ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchases FROM customers ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT reward_name, points_required, discount_amount FROM rewards WHERE discount_amount > 10;
SELECT program_name, discount_percentage FROM loyalty_programs WHERE discount_percentage > 0.1
SELECT customer_name, total_points FROM customers WHERE total_points >= 1000 ORDER BY total_points DESC
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE points_required < 5000 AND discount_amount > 10 ORDER BY discount_amount ASC
SELECT customer_name, total_purchases FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM loyalty_programs WHERE discount_percentage > 0.2)
SELECT program_name, discount_percentage, COUNT(*) AS total_programs FROM loyalty_programs GROUP BY program_name HAVING total_programs > 1
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 100
SELECT customer_id, reward_points FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_points DESC
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT offer_name, discount_percentage FROM offers
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' AND total_amount >= 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, r.reward_points AS points_earned FROM customers c JOIN rewards r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id WHERE r.reward_points > 500;
SELECT o.offer_name, o.discount_percentage, c.name AS customer_name FROM offers o JOIN customers c ON o.offer_id = c.customer_id WHERE o.discount_percentage >= 20 ORDER BY o.discount_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount, order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT c.customer_name, r.reward_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_rewards cr ON c.customer_id = cr.customer_id JOIN rewards r ON cr.reward_id = r.reward_id;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, SUM(p.price) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.total_amount = p.price GROUP BY c.customer_name HAVING total_spent > 1000;
